title: Tapped Out
description: Users can search for beer in local Charlotte breweries, add them to their cart and check out via PayPal.

title: Nerd Book
description: Users can create a profile with their email and Github profile and see profiles of other members that have joined the database

title: Find My Show
description: An application for searching songs, artists and albums, and finding upcoming tour dates for the artists.

title: Workout Tracker
description: An application for creating workouts with individual exercises, updating them and marking them completed, and displaying workout progress over time.

title: Day Planner
description: A planner for keeping track of your daily activities in one place.

title: Note Taker
description: Users can create notes and save them to a database.
